name: Transport Troubles
description:
In Transport Troubles you follow Amelia, a new member of the GCTS, the organization tasked with the transport and containment of prisoners in space.

During her first mission she is grouped with a strict mentor, meets an unusual and hardened prisoner, and is stuck being pushed around by both of them. For a first job, she will have her work cut out for her, but some things are not always as they seem. Will Amelia be able to walk the thin line between law and morality, or will the truth be too much for the rookie to handle?

Transport Troubles is a sci fi visual novel made for NaNoRenO 2017.

Features include:

  • 18k words
  • 2 endings
  • 106 images and 23 screens

Writing by Baron Tilde
Art by Emihaumut (emisketch.tumblr.com)
Programming & Editing by Almondwagers

Will probably release an update after this NaNo deadline to fix any bugs, but please enjoy what we have worked hard on this month!
